name: Hot Stunt Rider: Car Wheels
description:
Have you ever thought about what it would be like if you were a Hot Stunt wheel driver? Well now you can see!

HOT STUNT RACER is a fun racing game for everyone!

Get ready to drive through over exciting New levels in this physics based HOT STUNT RACER action game.

DOWNLOAD HOT STUNT RACER NOW!!!
